sentences.sContent: It is for psychologists to debate how far this method is likely to conduce to a better grasp of things.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is for psychologists to debate how far this method is likely to conduce to a better grasp of things.
sentences.sCn: 关于这种体罚方式能在多大程度上引导小孩对事物有更好的认识，这个问题可以留给心理学家去讨论。

trans.tranOther: to lead or contribute (to a result)
